title.no: På innsiden av min hjemmelagde Mellotron-kasse

content.no:
Laget en hjemmesnekra kasse til [Mellotron M4000D](equipment/instruments/mellotron-m4000d/) for en stund siden, som fungerer som keyboardstativ og pedalbrett for mine "alltid på"-effekter. All lyd er spilt inn gjennom en Universal Audio Apollo forforsterker og en [Hairball Audio FET/RACK Revision D (1176)](equipment/effects/hairball-audio-fet-rack-revision-d/).
Instrument: [Mellotron M4000D](equipment/instruments/mellotron-m4000d/).
Effekter: [Roger Mayer Voodoo-Vibe+](equipment/effects/roger-mayer-voodoo-vibe-plus/), [Hughes & Kettner - Tube Factor](equipment/effects/hughes-and-kettner-tube-factor/) og [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/).
content.en:
Made a custom case for the [Mellotron M4000D](equipment/instruments/mellotron-m4000d/) a while ago as a keyboard stand and a pedal board for my "always on" effects. Everything is recorded through a Universal Audio Apollo preamp and a [Hairball Audio FET/RACK Revision D (1176)](equipment/effects/hairball-audio-fet-rack-revision-d/).
Instrument: [Mellotron M4000D](equipment/instruments/mellotron-m4000d/).
Effects: [Roger Mayer Voodoo-Vibe+](equipment/effects/roger-mayer-voodoo-vibe-plus/), [Hughes & Kettner - Tube Factor](equipment/effects/hughes-and-kettner-tube-factor/) and [VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.](equipment/effects/vanamps-sole-mate-jr/).

thumbnailDescription: A Mellotron M4000D with a custom M400 styled cabinet

title.no: Jobber med et Yamaha L-20D lydbibliotek
title.en: Yamaha L-20D sample library in progress

content.no: Jobber med et nytt prøvebibliotek med [Yamaha L-20D elektrisk harmonium / reed organ](equipment/instruments/yamaha-l-20d/). Det nedre keyboardet er [Yamaha L-20D](equipment/instruments/yamaha-l-20d/) og det øvre keyboardet er en MIDI-kontroller som trigger samplene. Lyden fra [L-20D](equipment/instruments/yamaha-l-20d/) produseres akustisk fra selve harmoniumet og lyden fra samplene spilles av gjennom noen små høyttalere i rommet, som er hovedårsaken til at det låter litt forskjellig.
content.en: Working on a new sample library featuring the [Yamaha L-20D electric harmonium / reed organ](equipment/instruments/yamaha-l-20d/). The lower keyboard is the [Yamaha L-20D](equipment/instruments/yamaha-l-20d/) and the upper keyboard is a MIDI controller triggering the samples. The audio from the [L-20D](equipment/instruments/yamaha-l-20d/) is produced acoustically from the harmonium itself and the audio from the samples is played back through some small speakers in the room, which is the prominent cause of the difference in sound.

thumbnailDescription: A Yamaha L-20D electric harmonium with a MIDI controller on top being played

content.no:
Kombinerer lyden av [Roland SH-09 synthesizer](equipment/instruments/roland-sh-09/) og [Yamaha L-20D elektrisk harmonium / reed organ](equipment/instruments/yamaha-l-20d/).
Instrumenter: [Roland SH-09](equipment/instruments/roland-sh-09/) og [Yamaha L-20D](equipment/instruments/yamaha-l-20d/).
Mikrofoner: Par med AKG C451E.
Effekter: [Dehli Musikk Fuzz Boost Limiter](equipment/effects/dehli-musikk-fuzz-boost-limiter/), [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) og [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/).
content.en:
Layering sounds with a [Roland SH-09 synthesizer](equipment/instruments/roland-sh-09/) and [Yamaha L-20D electric harmonium / reed organ](equipment/instruments/yamaha-l-20d/).
Instruments: [Roland SH-09](equipment/instruments/roland-sh-09/) and [Yamaha L-20D](equipment/instruments/yamaha-l-20d/).
Microphones: Pair of AKG C451E.
Effects: [Dehli Musikk Fuzz Boost Limiter](equipment/effects/dehli-musikk-fuzz-boost-limiter/), [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) and [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/).

thumbnailDescription: A Yamaha L-20D harmonium with a Roland SH-09 synthesizer on top being played
